pis_title: Wood Stain & Sealer – Product Information Sheet (PIS)

titles.title: WoodGuard, Mold Resistant, Strong Adhesion
titles.premium: WATER BASED | Low VOC | Long-term Protection | Waterproof | Stain + Seal
titles.title2: Rich colour stain and sealer for all wood protection needs.

product_overview: Rich color stain and sealer for all wood protection needs.
short_description: Protects and covers aged, stained, or mismatched wood.
positioning: WoodGuard restores and seals wood surfaces with deep, rich colour and long-term protection.

features_benefits.benefit: Provides solid opaque stain with strong adhesion for wood surfaces
Protects against mold and fungal growth in exterior conditions
Forms a flexible film that resists peeling and flaking
Seals wood against water damage and moisture penetration
Combines decorative stain with protective sealing in one step

recommended_use.intro: Designed for exterior wooden surfaces requiring long-term protection and colour restoration.

application_system.label: Prepare Surface
application_system.purpose: Ensure wood surface is smooth, clean, and dust-free

application_system.label: Primer Coat (optional)
application_system.purpose: Use on highly porous or aged surfaces to improve adhesion

application_system.label: Topcoat
application_system.purpose: Apply 2 coats evenly with brush or roller

surface_preparation: Ensure wood surface is smooth and dust-free
Remove any loose particles, dirt, or old flaking coatings
Sand to open pores for better adhesion
Prime if surface is very porous
application: Apply 2 coats with brush or roller
Use smooth, even strokes for uniform coverage
storage_safety: Store in shade; avoid direct sunlight
Keep container sealed when not in use

safety_first_aid.General: Use gloves; work in ventilated area
safety_first_aid.Eye Contact: Rinse immediately with water; seek help if irritation persists
safety_first_aid.Ingestion: Seek immediate medical attention; do not induce vomiting

environmental_commitment: Water-based, low-VOC formula ensures eco-friendly protection for wood while minimizing impact on air quality.

specs_summary.application_instructions: Apply using brush or roller in smooth strokes on a clean, dry surface.
specs_summary.preparation_instructions: Surface must be smooth and dust-free before application
specs_summary.safety_precautions: Use gloves and ensure ventilation during application
specs_summary.storage_instructions: Store in shade; avoid sun and heat exposure
